data.title: Waiting for the Nobel Prize in literature
data.meta_description: Waiting for the Nobel Prize in literature
data.text:
What does Nobel Prize-awarded literature actually have in common? Is it good for an author to receive the Nobel Prize? How are things going for reading? And for writing?

An open conversation with researchers at Stockholm University ahead of this yearâs Literature Prize announcement.

Moderator: Karin Gyllenklev, journalist and presenter at Sweden Radio.

The conversation will take place live, with an opportunity for the audience to ask questions, but it will also be recorded as a podcast for later broadcasting.
